category.name: Integration.Configuring CAE
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CAE_tool_configuration_root
preference.preference_description: Contains the UID of item revisions, which are configured to identify the root directory of simulation tools. Valid Values: Accepts one string as value; the string must be a valid Teamcenter object, where the value is a single object string and the object is a dataset name.
